metadata.title: CVE-2024-26649 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix the null pointer when load rlc firmware If the RLC firmwareis invalid because of wrong header size, the pointer to the rlc firmware isreleased in function amdgpu_ucode_request. There will be a null pointererror in subsequent use. So skip validation to fix it.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26649` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.8.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.8.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.8.0-7.7
No subscription required
